CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 19, 1959, pg. A9 reads: "Coordinator - National Foundation coordinator for special events, Elaine Davis, left, chats with Jerry West and Dolly Mellix at the party given recently by the DIs at the beautiful home of member Gloria Grate. Mrs. West is press agent for Miss Mellix, who is Westinghouse High's candidate for the March of Dimes princess pageant.  The trio met at the affair which launched the DI's publicity for the annual National Foundation benefit, set for Jan. 3 at the New Arena, where the Parisian wardrobe created for the Foundation will get its first showing.  Co-chairman of the swank fashion extravaganza are Elayne Jones and Margaret W. Watson. - Harris Photo. - Adv."
TitMainTitle: Elaine Davis, Jerry West, and Dolly Mellix standing behind table with trays of appetizers, in home of Gloria Golden Grate for DI's launch party for annual National Foundation benefit
